name: Old-Time Movie Series Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
George Sanders.

	Suave George Sanders played the role before Roger Moore was Simon Templar in the TV series.

questions.text: Sidney Toler and Warner Oland starred in a series of movies about what detective?
questions.explanation:
Charlie Chan.

	'Blackie' was a different series. Lloyd Nolan starred as Shayne in several movies. Mickey Spillane also played his creation, Mike Hammer.

questions.text: In what Shirley Temple movie did she first sing her famous 'Good Ship Lollipop' song?
questions.explanation:
'Bright Eyes'.

	She made many movies, and they did quite well for the studio.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT an Abbott and Costello movie?
questions.explanation:
'Saps at Sea'.

	'Saps At Sea' is a Laurel and Hardy film.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Marx Brothers movie?
questions.explanation:
'Have Rocket, Will Travel'.

	'Have Rocket, Will Travel' stars the Three Stooges.

questions.text: Mickey Rooney starred as Andy Hardy in numerous movies. What was Andy's father's profession?
questions.explanation:
Judge.

	Old, wise Judge Hardy doled out fatherly advice.

questions.text: Who was NOT one of the Bowery Boys?
questions.explanation:
Carl Switzer.

	Switzer was Alfalfa in the 'Little Rascals' shorts.
